_sText:
Mission
==================
Industrial Complex - Bomb-Defuse

Counter-Terrorists: Prevent Terrorists
from bombing weapon crates.
Team members must defuse any bombs 
that threaten targeted areas.

Terrorists: The Terrorist carrying the
C4 must destroy targets. 

Other Notes: There are 2 
targets in the mission.

Credits : Created by Warhawk3407 - July 2011

Notes
------------------
The map still based on my previous map, dm\_industrial\_final, but I've rebuilt one area (BombA) and created a new one (BombB). The gameplay is balanced but T have to be aggressive to win. All files are packed in the BSP. **The nav file is complete**, bots are able to walk everywhere and I added place names.

Readme
==================
I would like feedbacks about gameplay experience and about the general design of the map. **Enjoy !**

### Map Overview
![overview](http://admins.left4ever.net/ressources/public_docs/de_industrial/img/de_industrial_beta_overview.jpg "overview")
